import React, { useState } from "react"; import { styled } from "@mui/material/styles"; import { getProducts } from "../api/products"; import PN from "persian-number"; import { TableContainer, Table, TableHead, TableRow, TableCell, TableBody, Box, Stack, FormControl, InputLabel, MenuItem, Select, Typography, } from "@mui/material"; export default function ListProducts() { const StyledTableCell = styled(TableCell)(({ theme }) => ({ backgroundColor: theme.palette.custom.main, color: theme.palette.primary.main, fontSize: "12px", fontWeight: 600, padding: "5px", textAlign: "center", borderStyle: "solid", borderWidth: "2px", borderColor: "white", })); const BodyTableCell = styled(TableCell)(({ theme }) => ({ fontSize: "12px", color: theme.palette.primary.main, fontWeight: 600, textAlign: "center", padding: "10px", borderWidthBottom: "0.5px", })); const StyldedTableRow = styled(TableRow)(({ theme }) => ({ "&:hover": { backgroundColor: theme.palette.custom.main, }, })); const FormControlStyle = { backgroundColor: "custom.main", borderRadius: "5px", marginBottom: "10px", }; const [products, setProducts] = useState(getProducts()); const [location, setLocation] = useState(""); const [size, setSize] = useState(""); const [state, setState] = useState(""); const [thickness, setThickness] = useState(""); const [length, setLength] = useState(""); const filterProducts = (filterName) => { products.filter((product) => product.filterName); }; return (
فیلتر گذاری دسته‌بندی سایز ضخامت طول محل تحویل
ردیف نام آنالیز محل بارگیری حالت سایز نوع واحد قیمت ۹٪ ارزش افزوده نمودار خرید {products.map((product, index) => ( {PN.convertEnToPe(index + 1)} {product.title} {product.analysis} {product.loading} {product.state} {PN.convertEnToPe(product.size)} {product.type} {product.unit} {PN.convertEnToPe(product.price)} {PN.convertEnToPe(product.tax)} نمودار خرید ))}
); }
